Docs.summary: Provides parsing support for and controls. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is created internally and used by the page parser when parsing a `<mobile:List>` or `<mobile:SelectionList>` tag. The ListControlBuilder class recognizes statically declared <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> elements.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .
